name: One Jump (Player9)
description:
A simple platformer where the aim of the game is to reach the goal!

Just one catch, though...you only have one jump! Make sure to use it wisely! Follow the hints on each of the 20 levels, avoid the hazards, collect items, and reach the goal!

Use the Spacebar to switch between WASD and Arrow Key movement controls.

Use the M key to toggle mute!

WASD:

A - Move left

D - Move right

W - Jump

Arrow Keys

< - Move left

> - Move Right

^ - Jump
